comments:

workbench. This is what stored in the log file.

Marking report as duplicate, but if you have a set of steps that shows this 
problem happening consistently then please add them to bug 22456.  (Also, if 
you determine such a set of steps then please try them on a recent 3.0 build, 
since this is the only stream that's currently being maintained).


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22456 ***
